text: I'm imagining a totally old-school, vow of silence monk as the bus driver.

name: wae
text: Or the Hunchback of Notre Dame, but with a tuxedo.

text: I'm imaging EYE-gor from "Young Frankenstein"

text: Completely, except that the bus driver will break the vow in times of doubt to console in Cornelius. Cornelius does not judge.

text: I want that bus!!

name: soticoto
text: I want it MORE.

text:
Every time I look at it something new and hilarious pops out at me.
I'm really digging the lamp.

text: But it's like calling Michael Cera Moose. It's a stupid nickname.

Not agreed!

text: prediction: no

text: Update: no

text:
...2011?
All signs point to 'no'.

name: dominus101
text: But Cornelius hasn't become less Badass, so no further competition is necessary. Unless he withdraws from the Games to allow someone a chance, in which case, the new games would be nothing but a farce.

name: bixschmix
text: Unless someone's been working at their badassitude in order to win the next competition...

name: bjorntd
text: Vlad's been gone from the strip a while. Maybe he's been in a Rocky-type montage to increase his tough guy-ness.

name: stereo
text:
He no longer apologises to chickens when he eats their eggs raw.

Hey, it's a start.

name: nobodyhome
text: IT MUST HAPPEN.

name: suprememongoose
text: That bus is fantastic! I love the details, like the lantern and the wooden door. Nice.

name: slab64
text: This vehicle needs to exist.

name: wildtoddler
text: Gargoyles... nice.

name: wiliamthepleasr
text: Gargoyles that look a lot like they were modeled on Blister. No one will convince me otherwise.

name: straw
text: A comment left by straw was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ishuta, Aaron_Haynes, STUART, Darthemed)

name: cheeks_jd
text: I think Ray just told him that to get him over without ruining the suprise of the bus.

name: _cheesekayke
text: Yes, the alt text says "The monogrammed hankies ploy is calculated to get Cornelius over in a hurry."

name: brokeaccount
text: I think they should have given him some handkerchiefs too, having got him so excited about it.

name: thegreatestcape
text: I think any disappointment at the lack of handkerchiefs would soon be subsumed by the joy of owning that badass ****ing bus

name: biddlebubbly
text: Why is ray's phone so dilapidated?

name: closefriend
text: It's a Gordon Gekko phone. Ray wants to be old-school himself.

name: moraiat
text:
The phone is jillapidated

http://achewood.com/index.php?date=09072004

Apparently they go way back.

name: tristanhw
text: Why is lyle hiding behind the corner? Just peering at them?

name: cheeks_jd
text:
He isnt. Roast Beef is telling him what horn to install. Lyle is good and installing car horns.

He installed Phillipes. "Here comes a huge fag!"

name: tekende
text: Which is why the horn is actually going to play "Jesu Joy of Man's Desiring Another Man."

text: Why has no one chubbied this oh cripes oh buggery

name: soticoto
text: Jesu joy of buggery?

name: helmstreet
text: If I ever get my ride pimped...this is it

name: steerpike66
text: A horn that plays 'Jesu Joy of Man's Desiring'. I love Onstad's choices; they are just so on the nail, all the time. Any other schmuck would have chosen something generic.

name: coldfrog
text: The bus has a lantern, and every evening an aged hunchback emerges from the fire exit with a sulphur match and an oaken cane and lights the children home to supper.

text: all lookin' like the dude in the Led Zeppelin IV liner notes

text:
the bus' wipers make it look angry

just FURIOUS

text: I got your back, bro. But look, I marked my feelings here as "Pro" to make up for it. We cool?

name: nigelchaos
text: It's actually the Celtic Cross

name: hendetta
text:
BADASS GAMES '07..

- Pick the right song to die to.
- Straight up tell a girl you like them.
- "Leave" contest.
- Take off your jacket correctly.

name: pyro_ike
text: Add an event for punching suckers and this will be a Sport of Kings!

name: baryonyx
text:
"Some way creepy dude from the Internet is attempting to e-bugger your best little buddy! How do you react?"

Cornelius then wins the event by way of taking a cricket bat to the computer.

name: tragicone
text: actually ray wins for having people make a death relationship with him.

name: wiliamthepleasr
text: I don't know, I think destroying a computer is more badass than lying to someone over the phone that you've hired hitmen.  On second thought, maybe that's just me....

name: epicurus
text: Those are extremely plausible.

name: diggidy
text:
BADASS GAMES '08..

- Start a fire with only dry leaves and twigs.
- Talk your way out of a speeding ticket.
- Convince a communist to vote democratic.
- Correctly distinguish between butter and I-can't-believe-it's-not-butter.

name: gsail11
text:
I like the analog clock.

Shit's gotta be real old to have an analog clock.

name: epicurus
text: The four events listed on the right read more like a list of spells from a Japanese Role Playing Game for the PSX.

name: tekende
text: Such a vehicle would get hell of bad gas mileage.

name: kelsotimebomb
text: But bad gas mileage is OLD SCHOOL.

name: dino_grill
text:
this entire story arc gets a 5
i tried to host a similar contest in college, but the events mainly centered around various types of consumption. ended badly.

name: echidnaboy
text: How badly? Did the contestants die of consumption? That is pretty old school.

name: st_elmos_fire
text:
Shiiiit that right there is my ride, I don't drive but if I did then that would be it, I could totally do this thing, I just gotta learn some sort of metal work and by an old school bus

Shiiiit I could do this thing
It has totally been added to my list of dreams that will probably never be fulfilled but have slight chances of becoming so.

text: As an 18-year old Norwegian I can safely say that this would be the best Russ Bus, ever

text:
and yes, i know that the car would change orientation constantly and all other such things to confound the use of a sundial

this is why the idea is that the sundial would be on a compass-based system with many gears and mechaniques to guarantee is usefulness in all situations
